p: Following HIV acquisition, modelled individuals move into the high‐infectivity acute stage, and then into one of 16 chronic infection states defined by SPVL and CD4 count 16. Those not on ART, and those on ART but non‐adherent, move through progressively lower CD4 states 16; those adherent to ART do not. Increases in CD4 count for those adherent to ART are not explicitly modelled, but survival on ART is modelled as a function of initial CD4 count.
